title: Tomahawk'd
description: At a Wisconsin resort, Jackson and Erin meet as children forming a bond that is continued through letters even after the summer ends. Their adolescence is turbulent and it finds them separated from each other until an emergency in Jack’s life brings them back together in adulthood.Tomahawk’d, a coming of age story, full of suspense and twists with characters to love and hate.
author: Diane S. Bauden
